Welcome to Charter Heating Services Ltd | Based in Rickmansworth, Watford


Charter Heating are a friendly second generation small family business, offering a conscientious and professional service to our commercial and residential customers. We are experienced in providing gas appliance services for all types of heating installations and associated equipment for a variety of different clients.

Charter Heating Services Ltd provide expert Domestic & Commercial Gas Engineers covering Herts, Bucks, Beds and Middlesex. We have an enviable client base which we have lovingly developed through exceptional service levels and professional, safe heating installations.

“What excellent service we had from your team earlier today. Roger called the office at 5 when we found the heating had gone off following the very short electricity power failure earlier in the afternoon. By 6.30 Tom had been and got it working again. There can’t be many companies that provide such a brilliant response.”

Thank you so much – Diane


Staying safe….

Most gas appliances, when properly installed and serviced, and that have sufficient ventilation, are very efficient and safe.

To avoid the production of CO, ensure adequate ventilation into the room where the appliance is located.

There are a number of CO detectors available on the market.

Remember that these must never be used instead of an annual gas safety check, but only as a supplement to proper installation and maintenance of your appliance, and awareness of living safely with gas.

 

If you are considering a CO detector, make sure it meets current British standards and always choose an audible one so that you could be alerted even if you are asleep. ALWAYS read the instructions carefully before installing it.
